roleset.name: to condemn
roleset.note: DOOM-V NOTES: Frames file for 'doom' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus; adjectival 'doomed' based on BOLT-2,3, BOLT-4,5. (from doom.01-v)
DOOMED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from doomed.01-j)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: [A minor bureaucrat]-1 dies suddenly , [*-1]dooming his family to poverty and eventual disgrace .

example.name: Adjective usage
example.text: But he was doomed to meet with disappointment.
